title: Notification is set to silent, but vibrates even when on do not disturb. How do I fix?
content:
Whenever I install a blue light filter app, the phone vibrates throughout the night (even when it is on do not disturb).
It is vibrating due to a system notification advising that the blue light filter app is displaying over other apps.
These notification types are set to silent with no vibration, however there is a bug in the system causing them to vibrate. It keeps me awake all night.

See below a screenshot of the notification setting.

Note there is no option to disable the notification.
